attributes.action: sex offenders must be on the register for life
attributes.additional_details: sex offenders are are being given light sentences and they should be on the register for life and not allowed to be housed in communities near children or schools.every day i read the news and another sex offender has been 'awarded a light sentence .  they are not being punished.   i find it very unfair the sentences handed for drug posession are harsher than a sex offender.  drug offenders can change with the correct health support. a sex offender remains a sex offender and will not change.

rejection.details:
